entry.title: Oregon DFR encourages people to protect themselves against relationship investment scams
entry.summary: The Oregon Division of Financial Regulation (DFR) is warning people to be wary of an unexpected text or direct message from a stranger – it might be the first step in a relationship investment scam, also known as a romance scam or “pig butchering.” The post Oregon DFR encourages people to protect themselves against relationship investment scams appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.

entry.title: GOVERNOR PROCLAIMS FEBRUARY EARTHQUAKE AND TSUNAMI AWARENESS MONTH
entry.summary: February 7, 2025 2:50 a.m. Governor Tina Kotek has proclaimed February Earthquake and Tsunami Awareness Month in Oregon. A release from the Oregon Department of Emergency Management said in the past, Oregon has suffered considerable damage from moderate earthquake events. That includes the 1993 Scotts Mills and Klamath Falls earthquakes and from a deadly tsunami...
